name: DISCONTINUED Light TweetDeck Classic Aero
description: I am officially discontinuing all my TweetDeck themes, so they may be outdated, but feel free to fork them (they now are into the public domain)! This style needs to be used with the light theme of TweetDeck, otherwise it will be ugly ! As you can see this style is a little bit light with round corners, transparency effects... The best way to describe it is that you discover it by yourself. Here you'll find the same style but without the transparency effect at the top of the columns.
